product.description: Enjoy 80 hours of fragrance from our most highly-scented Melts. Each tray snaps into nine Melts. Create a custom fragrance with two different Melts. Use in our ScentGlow™ or Fragrance Warmers, sold separately. Available in dozens of exclusive fragrances including our Vanilla Citron fragrance, an exotic vanilla laced with the tropical touch of fresh citrus and florals.
product.name: Vanilla Citron Scent Plus™ Melts

product.description: With a nod to the Far East, our crackle glazed ceramic ginger jar brings an element of worldliness to your room. Electric warming plate diffuses the fragrance of Scent Plus® Melts or scented oil, all sold separately. Hidden LED provides a welcoming glow. Remove lid for a stronger fragrance throw. White cord. 6 1/4" (16 cm) h, 5" (13 cm) dia.
product.name: ScentGlow™ Warmer Ginger Jar

product.description: Enjoy 80 hours of fragrance from our most highly-scented Melts. Each tray snaps into nine Melts. Create a custom fragrance with two different Melts. Use in our ScentGlow™ or Fragrance Warmers, sold separately. Available in dozens of exclusive fragrances including our Poinsettia & Musk fragrance, a fruity floral blend of festive red poinsettia and warm musk.
product.name: Poinsettia & Musk Scent Plus® Melts
